```{r}
install.packages("reshape")
install.packages("ggstats")
library(reshape)
library(ggstats)
```

```{r}
model <- lm(tip ~ day + time + total_bill, data = tips)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
model %>% summary()
```


```{r}
model %>% ggcoef_model(intercept = TRUE)

```
